named-query.name: BC_BASIC_INVENTORY_READ_INVENTORY_FOR_SKU
named-query.query: select sku.basicQuantityAvailable from org.broadleafcommerce.inventory.basic.domain.ext.BasicInventoryContainerImpl sku where sku.id = :skuId

named-query.name: BC_BASIC_INVENTORY_READ_INVENTORY_FOR_SKUS
named-query.query: select sku.id, sku.basicQuantityAvailable from org.broadleafcommerce.inventory.basic.domain.ext.BasicInventoryContainerImpl sku where sku.id in :skuIds
